attributes.additional_details:
A recent poll suggested that 51% of  brits want to leave the european union

But why do we have to wait for a year, and why do we have to spend unnecessary taxpayers money in a time of austerity on a lenghthy campaign.
                                           LETS VOTE NOW.
attributes.background:
Why spend more taxpayers money on a lengthy campaign lasting a year.
                                       LETS VOTE NOW.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107595
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
